name: BrainLinked
description:
In Brain Linked your characters' brain are linked and they move toghether.We tried our best to do a HMTL build but it just didn't work...sry.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Press M to go to the main menu.

Press N to skip the current level.

Press R to restart.

Art: Eben Mostert

Code: Christiaan Mostert
